name: IceBreakers (itch)
description:
24 contestants, and only 1 winner. Join in for a free to play battle arena multiplayer experience where players can dynamically change the environment to make the game play harder the longer you play.

Quick and easy to pick up game experience to play with your friends, and game that is based off of skills. Play single player against AI or host a match within the same region location through your steam account. 

Free to play game with no micro transactions.
